name: Into the Forest (Thortates)
description:
Into the Forest is a short 2D Action-RPG game where you play as a prince from a cursed country trying to redeem his motherland. Accompanied by your companions, set out to delve deeper into the forest. 

The assets in this game are built from scratch and captured from unity default sprites , self-drawn and royalty free sounds websites . 

########################################

Created to showcase NPC Companion AI using fuzzy logic for final year's project.
